findings.title: Avoid Unnecessary Uses of Smaller Sized Integer Types
findings.description: The contract used smaller sized integer types (uint32 and uint8) which could lead to overflow and be error-prone, instead of uniformly using uint256 type which is sufficient and cleaner for the current business logic.

findings.title: Avoid Unnecessary Uses of Division and Modulo Operation
findings.description: The contract unnecessarily used div and mod operations, leading to poor code readability.
